library(leaflet)

byd_shp <- readOGR("shp/Study_Area_NEW.shp", verbose = FALSE)

leaflet() %>%
  addPolygons(data = byd_shp,
                  color = "black",
                  weight = 2,
                  opacity = 1,
                  fillOpacity = 0.2) %>%
  addTiles() %>% addScaleBar(position = 'topleft') %>% setView(-1, 8, zoom = 6)
